name: KO
effects: KO'd, can't act, persists after battle

name: Conditional Attach Element From Party
effects: Grants [Attach Fire/Ice/Lightning/Earth/Wind/Water/Holy/Dark/Poison] if current number of combined Attach Element statuses on party members are a majority Attach Fire/Ice/Lightning/Earth/Wind/Water/Holy/Dark/Poison. Considers number of stacks on a character as well (Attach Fire at level 2 counts as 2). In the case of ties the prior listed order is used to determine status granted
notes: Placeholder status for database purposes, in-game the logic of what to grant isn't controlled through a status but through a if/else set of sub conditions

name: Conditional Attach Element with Stacking
effects: Grants [Attach Fire/Ice/Lightning/Earth/Wind/Water/Holy/Dark/Poison with Stacking] if the user has [Attach Fire/Ice/Lightning/Earth/Wind/Water/Holy/Dark/Poison]
notes: Placeholder status for database purposes, in-game the logic of what to grant isn't controlled through a status but through a if/else set of sub conditions
